alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Central Greenville; Northern Spartanburg; Southern Greenville; Southern Spartanburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 30 at 6:13AM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...AN AREA OF HEAVY RAIN WILL IMPACT EAST CENTRAL GREENVILLE... CENTRAL SPARTANBURG AND NORTH CENTRAL ANDERSON COUNTIES UNTIL 715 AM EST... At 609 AM EST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain with embedded isolated thunderstorms covering much of the Greenville and Spartanburg metro areas. Impacted locations include... Greenville, Spartanburg, Greer, Mauldin, Taylors, Berea, Five Forks and Welcome. Rainfall rates of around one half inch per hour are expected in these areas. Storm total amounts of up to 2.5 inches are likely in these areas before the rain tapers off later this morning.
info.instruction: Heavy rainfall may flood areas with poor drainage, such as ditches and underpasses. Avoid these areas and do not cross flooded roads. Water levels of small streams may also rise rapidly. Seek higher ground if threatened by flood waters.

area.areaDesc: Anderson; Central Greenville; Northern Spartanburg; Southern Greenville; Southern Spartanburg
